author: cms-sw
body:
This should avoid the warnings like [a] and also it should use the GNU Make server[b] to run multiple processes for at link step

[a]
```
lto-wrapper: warning: using serial compilation of 6 LTRANS jobs
lto-wrapper: note: see the '-flto' option documentation for more information
```

[b]
```
Use -flto=auto to use GNU makes job server, if available, or otherwise fall back to autodetection of the number of CPU threads present in your system. 
```
title: [LTO] Improve link time by using multiple process for linking
